## StraightSegment.gradientAtPoint() method

returns the gradient of the segment at the given point - which for us is constant.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gradientAtPoint(location: number, absolute?: boolean): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  location | number |  |
|  absolute | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
